story_parts.text: The lion was very excited to go to Disney World. He had always wanted to go there and finally had the chance. He packed his bags and got on the plane.

next_options.0: The lion had a great time at Disney World
next_options.1: The lion didn't have a great time at Disney World

story_parts.text: The lion had a great time at Disney World. He went on all the rides and met all the characters. He even got to see the fireworks show. It was a dream come true for him and he was so happy.

next_options.0: The lion woke up from his dream and was sad that he was not really at Disney World
next_options.1: The lion continued to have a great time at Disney World and went on even more rides

story_parts.text: The lion woke up from his dream and was sad that he was not really at Disney World. He was disappointed that it was all just a dream. However, he was still happy that he got to experience it in his mind.

next_options.0: The lion decides to go to Disney World for real and makes plans to go there
next_options.1: The lion forgets about his dream and goes back to sleep

story_parts.text: The lion decides to go to Disney World for real and makes plans to go there. He packs his bags and gets on a plane. When he arrives, he is amazed by all the sights and sounds. He goes on all the rides and meets all the characters. He even gets to see the fireworks show. It is a dream come true for him and he is so happy.

next_options.0: The lion has a great time at Disney World and goes home happy
next_options.1: The lion gets homesick and decides to go back to Africa

story_parts.text: The lion has a great time at Disney World and goes home happy. He is so excited to tell all his friends about his amazing adventure.

next_options.0: The lion's friends are so jealous and wish they could have gone too
next_options.1: The lion's friends are happy for him and can't wait to hear all about his trip

story_parts.text: The lion's friends are so jealous and wish they could have gone too. They all want to know what it was like and if he had a good time. The lion tells them all about his adventure and how much fun he had. His friends are so happy for him and are glad that he got to experience it.

next_options.0: The lion's friends are happy for him, but also a little jealous
